data.body: bead-hierarchy.ts, bead-sort.ts, and bead-utils.ts have 0% coverage. They appear to be dead code superseded by their beat-* counterparts (beat-hierarchy.ts, beat-sort.ts, beat-utils.ts) which have good coverage. Verify these are unused, remove them, and update any remaining imports.
data.title: Remove dead bead-*.ts files (0% coverage, replaced by beat-*.ts)
